# The `Tracker` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The tracker collects all the change objects and implements the main API for saving / reverting / accepting. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::sandboxir::Tracker</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

The tracker collects all the change objects and implements the main API for saving / reverting / accepting.

Definition at line 440 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/tracker-h">Tracker.h</a>.
